LoginProperties | Methods | Events | Skin Parts | Skin States
 
Packagecom.nitrolm.comp
Classpublic class Login
InheritanceLogin spark.components.SkinnableContainer

A Skinnable login component. It helps in handling logins, new user registration, password resets, and password changes.

Default MXML PropertymxmlContentFactory

Skin Parts

This component uses skins made up of skin parts. Do not set the skin parts directly. The component's skin sets the skin parts.

Skin States

To skin the component, implement a skin that defines the following states. Although you must implement all skin states, a skin state can be empty. An empty skin state specifies no changes to the default skin state.


 Skin State Description Defined By
  
changepassword
Login
  
demo
Login
  
forgotpassword
Login
  
login
Login
  
register
Login

corpIdproperty 
public var corpId:String

corpIdRequiredproperty 
corpIdRequired:Boolean  [read-only]

if true, upon registration, user will have to provide a corporate id. The user's email will be validated against pool restrictions under this corpid to ensure the user will be allowed to get a license.

This property can be used as the source for data binding.


Implementation
    public function get corpIdRequired():Boolean
